verses.text: Hear us, Shepherd \w of|strong="H4210"\w* Israel, you who \w lead|strong="H5329"\w* Joseph like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* flock, you who sit above \w the|strong="H5329"\w* cherubim, shine out.

\w Before|strong="H3427"\w* Ephraim, Benjamin, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* Manasseh, stir \w up|strong="H7462"\w* \w your|strong="H3478"\w* \w might|strong="H3478"\w*! \w Come|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* save \w us|strong="H3478"\w*!

Turn \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w again|strong="H3212"\w*, God. Cause \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* shine, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3444"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* saved.

\w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Hosts, how \w long|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* angry \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* prayer \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* people?

\w You|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* fed \w them|strong="H5704"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* bread \w of|strong="H3068"\w* tears, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* given \w them|strong="H5704"\w* tears \w to|strong="H5704"\w* drink \w in|strong="H3068"\w* large measure.

\w You|strong="H8248"\w* \w make|strong="H8248"\w* \w us|strong="H8248"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* source \w of|strong="H3899"\w* contention \w to|strong="H3899"\w* \w our|strong="H8248"\w* neighbours. \w Our|strong="H8248"\w* enemies laugh amongst themselves.

\w Turn|strong="H7760"\w* \w us|strong="H7760"\w* again, God \w of|strong="H7760"\w* Hosts. Cause \w your|strong="H7760"\w* face \w to|strong="H4066"\w* shine, \w and|strong="H7934"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H7934"\w* \w be|strong="H7760"\w* saved.

\w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* vine \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Egypt. \w You|strong="H6440"\w* drove \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w nations|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* planted \w it|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w You|strong="H1471"\w* cleared \w the|strong="H1644"\w* ground \w for|strong="H4714"\w* \w it|strong="H1644"\w*. \w It|strong="H1644"\w* \w took|strong="H5265"\w* deep root, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* filled \w the|strong="H1644"\w* land.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* mountains \w were|strong="H6440"\w* \w covered|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w its|strong="H4390"\w* shadow. \w Its|strong="H4390"\w* boughs \w were|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H4390"\w* God’s cedars.

\w It|strong="H3680"\w* sent out \w its|strong="H3680"\w* \w branches|strong="H6057"\w* \w to|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* sea, \w its|strong="H3680"\w* shoots \w to|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* River.

Why \w have|strong="H5104"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* broken \w down|strong="H7971"\w* \w its|strong="H3220"\w* walls, \w so|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* those who pass \w by|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w way|strong="H7971"\w* pluck \w it|strong="H5704"\w*?

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* boar \w out|strong="H6555"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wood ravages \w it|strong="H5674"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* wild animals \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* field feed \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w it|strong="H5674"\w*.
Turn again, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* beg you, God \w of|strong="H7704"\w* Hosts. Look down \w from|strong="H7704"\w* heaven, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* see, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* visit this vine,

\w the|strong="H7200"\w* stock \w which|strong="H6635"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w right|strong="H5027"\w* hand planted, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* branch \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w made|strong="H6485"\w* strong \w for|strong="H6635"\w* yourself.

\w It|strong="H5921"\w*’s burnt \w with|strong="H5921"\w* fire. \w It|strong="H5921"\w*’s cut \w down|strong="H5921"\w*. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* perish \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* rebuke.

Let \w your|strong="H6440"\w* hand \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* right hand, \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* son \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w made|strong="H8313"\w* strong \w for|strong="H6440"\w* yourself.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w turn|strong="H1961"\w* away \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*. Revive \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* call \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* name.

\w Turn|strong="H5472"\w* \w us|strong="H2421"\w* again, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* Hosts. \w Cause|strong="H7121"\w* \w your|strong="H4480"\w* face \w to|strong="H7121"\w* shine, \w and|strong="H2421"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w saved|strong="H2421"\w*.
